      • Wireless ECWP series
          ECWP100

          • Finger-size potentiostat

          • Wireless connect,plug and play

          • Expanded to 8 Channels

          • wo interface type for almost all electrodes

          ECWP100-single

          • Finger-size potentiostat

          • Wireless connect,plug and play

          • Single channel, connected together available

          • Two interface type for almost all electrodes

      • Full function simulator series
          ECAS100

          • Replaceable and Editable Chip

          • 5.0 inches color touch panel

          • Simulation of chemical sensor for off-line use

          • Electrochemical analyzer and potentiostat

          ACIP100

          • Replaceable and Editable Chip

          • 5.0 inches color touch panel

          • Simulation of chemical sensor for off-line use

          • Electrochemical and AC impedance analyzer

      • Multi-channel
          MCP100

          • 2 to 10 channels design

          • controlled together or separately

          • 3 methods of electrochemical experiment

      • Screen printed electrodes

          • No pretreatment & maintenance free

          • excellent electrochemical performance

          • Small lot-to-lot difference

          • Various materials & sizes
